name: How Can I Help You?
description:
Take care of guests in this game made for the Extra Credits game jam!!

Check in guests, make food, and buy new hotel rooms in "How Can I Help You?"! This game was made in three days the the jam as a little project to get me back into game development. Of the three days I only worked for two so there is not much game play. This was more or a short little challenge to test my skills in path finding and dynamic systems for games.

Hope you guys enjoy!
